text: Nader Shah Afshar () was a Shah, or king, of Azerbaijanfrom 1736 to 1747. He was also the founder of the Afsharid dynasty . During the time he ruled Iran, he attacked India and defeated Muhammad Shah, conquered Delhi, and agreed to retreat for Indian wealth and gold. == Sources == * ==References== Category:1747 deaths Category:History of Iran Category:1698 births
title: Nader Shah
